4
Determine if the required Reserve or National Guard STRs are certified and available in the Joint Longitudinal Viewer (JLV).
Notes
:
JLV provides access to electronic Department of Defense (DoD) health records, including STRs that have been scanned into HAIMS.
Certified STRs refers to STRs with certifications of completeness described in
M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, 2.A.3.a and b
.
Veterans receiving post-service treatment as a dependent or retiree will appear in JLV but should not be mistaken for STRs.
Other than the specific case stated below, data should not be changed in the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) systems to generate a request to HAIMS when the Veteran’s service periods ended prior to January 1, 2014, for Army, Navy, Marine Corps, Air Force, and prior to September 1, 2014, for Coast Guard.

RV1

NG1

6
Review the status of the PIES request if the STRs have not been received after the expiration of the suspense period.
If the internal PIES response message has been pending for ...

less than 30 days

Note

7
Extend the suspense period for the HAIMS STR follow-up request at 30-day intervals until the STRs are received.  Additional follow-up e-mails to VALO are not required.
Important
:  When a Veteran indicates private medical treatment for a condition related to Reserve or National Guard duty during, or in close proximity to, the time frame in which the duty was conducted, obtain the records as described in
M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, 1.A
for consideration in deciding the claim.
